description:
Provide access to comprehensive news data including articles, stories, journalists, sources, people, companies, and topics through advanced search and filtering capabilities. Enable agents to retrieve up-to-date news content and metadata to power news-related applications and workflows. Integrate seamlessly with Perigon's news ecosystem using a secure and scalable MCP server.

Please use the official hosted MCP server from this URLs:

- HTTP (Streamable): https://mcp.perigon.io/v1/mcp
- Server-Sent Events (SSE): https://mcp.perigon.io/v1/sse

Checkout out the docs for more info: https://dev.perigon.io/docs/mcp
